summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 0.5 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 172 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 890 m), rainfall (down 0.1 mm), and inside temperature (up 1.7°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 172.2m lower than yesterday, 14.9m lower than the past week, 890.1m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 745m to 3580m and averaged 1814.3m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: The sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. Rain showers likely, the sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine, and bright sunshine will dominate the day. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
